subtitle.en: Let's discuss opportunities and collaborate on exciting projects
subtitle.zh: 让我们讨论机会并在精彩的项目上合作
subtitle.fr: Discutons des opportunités et collaborons sur des projets passionnants
subtitle.default: Let's discuss opportunities and collaborate on exciting projects

description.en: I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question, want to discuss a potential collaboration, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you!
description.zh: 我始终对新机会和有趣的项目持开放态度。无论您有问题、想讨论潜在的合作，还是只是想打个招呼，我都很乐意收到您的来信！
description.fr: Je suis toujours ouvert aux nouvelles opportunités et aux projets intéressants. Que vous ayez une question, souhaitiez discuter d'une collaboration potentielle, ou simplement dire bonjour, j'aimerais avoir de vos nouvelles !
description.default: I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting projects. Whether you have a question, want to discuss a potential collaboration, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you!

value.en: Follow my lifestyle and tech sharing
value.zh: 关注我的生活和技术分享
value.fr: Suivez mes partages de style de vie et de technologie
value.default: Follow my lifestyle and tech sharing
